name: Slime 'n' Dice
description:
Slime 'n' Dice is a game made for the GMTK game jam 2022.

In this game, the only way you can attack is to roll dice to determine your attack. But be careful you only have so many dice to spare.

Defeat all the enemies to make your way to the next dungeon and defeat the slime boss.
